datasets.name: LIAR Dataset
datasets.description: Benchmark dataset for fake news detection with 6-class labels from PolitiFact
datasets.citation: Wang, W. Y. (2017). 'Liar, Liar Pants on Fire': A New Benchmark Dataset for Fake News Detection. ACL 2017.

datasets.name: ISOT Fake News Dataset
datasets.description: Large-scale dataset with real and fake news articles collected from Reuters and various fake news sites
datasets.citation: Ahmed, H., Traore, I., & Saad, S. (2017). Detection of Online Fake News Using N-Gram Analysis and Machine Learning Techniques. ISDDC 2017.

datasets.name: FakeNewsNet - PolitiFact
datasets.description: News content with social context from PolitiFact fact-checking
datasets.citation: Shu, K., Mahudeswaran, D., Wang, S., Lee, D., & Liu, H. (2020). FakeNewsNet: A Data Repository with News Content, Social Context, and Spatiotemporal Information. Big Data 2020.
datasets.notes: Requires Twitter API access for full social context; news content available separately

datasets.name: FakeNewsNet - GossipCop
datasets.description: Entertainment news with fact-checking labels from GossipCop
datasets.citation: Shu, K., Mahudeswaran, D., Wang, S., Lee, D., & Liu, H. (2020). FakeNewsNet: A Data Repository with News Content, Social Context, and Spatiotemporal Information. Big Data 2020.
datasets.notes: Requires Twitter API access for full social context

datasets.name: FEVER - Fact Extraction and VERification
datasets.description: Large-scale dataset for fact verification against Wikipedia evidence
datasets.citation: Thorne, J., Vlachos, A., Christodoulopoulos, C., & Mittal, A. (2018). FEVER: A Large-scale Dataset for Fact Extraction and VERification. NAACL 2018.

datasets.name: CREDBANK
datasets.description: Large-scale crowdsourced dataset of tweets with credibility annotations
datasets.citation: Mitra, T., & Gilbert, E. (2015). CREDBANK: A Large-Scale Social Media Corpus with Associated Credibility Annotations. ICWSM 2015.
datasets.notes: Requires Twitter API to hydrate tweet IDs

notes: Some datasets require API access or manual download. LIAR and ISOT are fully downloadable.
